short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows users to quickly check a specific DC Metro station's live train schedule.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The times are updated automatically every time the extension icon is clicked/loaded.

Contact: http://brandonfunkhouser.com
